Question.Subject: How to get free club penguin membership?
Question.Content: Hey.. Im looking for a hack or something that allows me to get free club penguin membership Please notice that i live in DK and i cannot use prizerebel Please help me out
Question.ChosenAnswer:
That's easy! I live in Lebanon (Middle East) and use PrizeRebel to get iTunes gift cards and stuff. Your problem can easily be solved by using a VPN which changes your IP to a US IP.
1. Go to http://www.hotspotshield.com/ and download the program. 2. Install Hotspot Shield after downloading it. 3. Open the program and wait for it to connect. 4. Go to PrizeRebel and complete offers!
As a thank you, I would really appreciate you would sign up with my referral link :) http://www.prizerebel.com/index.php?r=340561
